title: Soil legislation and policies: Bibliometric analysis, systematic review and quantitative approaches with an emphasis on the specific cases of the European Union and Portugal
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Vítor João Pereira Domingues Martinho, António José Dinis Ferreira, Carlos Cunha, José Luís da Silva Pereira, María del Carmen Sánchez-Carreira, Nádia Luísa Castanheira, Tiago Brito Ramos
